ygData.subject: Re: Hunting in rathe Mtns (was Need some serious help)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Only problem with that is, you re going to be awfully tired of lower guk by your mid-late 40 s. Personally, I d put off going there until everywhere else
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Dec 10/99, Dave Gaines <dave@...> wrote:
> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
> Let me offer a different place:
>
> Mid to High 30s xp, 3+ group members.
> Lower Guk Live Side. Sit at the base of the ramp as you zone in.
> Pull anything you see. Easily get 15% xp per hour with a decent tank.
> Puller should be safe pulling from as far in as he can. 37.5 minute
> spawn time, so lots of different stuff to kill.

Only problem with that is, you're going to be awfully tired of lower guk
by your mid-late 40's. Personally, I'd put off going there until
everywhere else you can possibly hunt is green. At mid-high 30's I think
the king room in perma is still quite blue. I'm not sure when the exp
tapers off in the king and other deep areas in Sol A, but I'd check
there. Both of these places require good parties before you go though.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
